Peacock Slices
--------------

~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dependencies
~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Peacock AE Utility :doc:`../ae_utils/readme`
* Peacock UI Utility :doc:`../ui_utils/readme`

~~~~~
Slice
~~~~~

Click :guilabel:`Slice` to slice the selected layer according to the slices in the ``sliceArray``.

~~~~~~~~~~~
Show slices
~~~~~~~~~~~

Show all slices of the sliceArray.
